author: Tay Yong Kwang J:
casename: Lim Yuen Li Eugene v Singapore Shuttle Bus Service Pte Ltd and Another
counsel: Daniel Poon (Daniel Poon and Co) for the plaintiff; Martin Lee (Goh Poh and Partners) for the defendants
